data.name: AnalyzerDescription
data.value: Async database write operations like '{0}' should be awaited. Fire-and-forget calls may cause data loss or hide database errors.
data.comment: An optional longer localizable description of the diagnostic.

data.name: RepoSyncInAsyncDescription
data.value: Blocking synchronous repository operations in async code can cause deadlocks and thread starvation. Use async versions instead.
data.comment: An optional longer localizable description of the diagnostic.

data.name: RepoAsyncAwaitDescription
data.value: Async database write operations like '{0}' should be awaited. Fire-and-forget calls may cause data loss or hide database errors.
data.comment: An optional longer localizable description of the diagnostic.

data.name: AnalyzerMessageFormat
data.value: Call to '{0}' is not awaited. Await the method to ensure database changes are applied and errors are observed.
data.comment: The format-able message the diagnostic displays.

data.name: RepoAsyncAwaitMessageFormat
data.value: Call to '{0}' is not awaited. Await the method to ensure database operations are applied and errors are observed.
data.comment: The format-able message the diagnostic displays.

data.name: AnalyzerTitle
data.value: Async UOW method must be awaited

data.name: RepoAsyncAwaitTitle
data.value: Async Repo method must be awaited

data.name: SyncLinqInAsyncTitle
data.value: Use async EF Core query methods

data.name: RepoSyncInAsyncTitle
data.value: Avoid synchronous repository methods in async code

data.name: BlockingEfQueryTaskWaitTitle
data.value: Avoid blocking on EF async query tasks

data.name: BlockingEfQueryTaskWaitDescription
data.value: This code blocks on an EF Core async query task using Result, Wait(), or GetAwaiter().GetResult() inside an async method. Blocking on Task defeats the benefits of asynchronous EF I/O and can cause thread starvation or deadlocks in ASP.NET applications. Prefer using 'await' on the async query method (for example 'await query.ToListAsync()') instead of blocking.
data.comment: An optional longer localizable description of the diagnostic.

data.name: SyncLinqInAsyncDescription
data.value: This call executes a synchronous EF Core query inside an async method, blocking the thread. Use async EF Core query methods such as ToListAsync(), FirstAsync(), SingleAsync(), or CountAsync() to avoid potential deadlocks and improve scalability.
data.comment: An optional longer localizable description of the diagnostic.

data.name: UowSyncInAsyncDescription
data.value: This call executes a synchronous UOW async method within async function. Use relevand async method instead that does not block the trhead thus avoiding potential deadlocks and improve scalability.
data.comment: An optional longer localizable description of the diagnostic.

data.name: SyncLinqInAsyncMessageFormat
data.value: Synchronous EF query operator '{0}' in async method — use async counterpart (e.g. '{0}Async').
data.comment: The format-able message the diagnostic displays.

data.name: RepoSyncInAsyncMessageFormat
data.value: Call to synchronous repository method '{0}' inside an async method; use the async counterpart instead
data.comment: The format-able message the diagnostic displays.

data.name: UowSyncInAsyncMessageFormat
data.value: Synchronous UOW method '{0}' in async method — use async counterpart ('{0}Async')
data.comment: The format-able message the diagnostic displays.

data.name: BlockingEfQueryTaskWaitMessageFormat
data.value: Blocking on EF async query tasks using '{0}' inside an async method can cause deadlocks; use 'await' instead
data.comment: The format-able message the diagnostic displays.
